ca.keefer.sanemethod.Entity
Class Door

java.lang.Object
  ca.keefer.sanemethod.Entity.AbstractEntity
      ca.keefer.sanemethod.Entity.Door
All Implemented Interfaces:
Entity
public class Door
extends AbstractEntity

This class extends AbstractEntity, and implements a 'door' which can be controlled by a switch entity. This door is actually composed of a physical body whose dimensions are defined at run-time, and a number of static (?) images. The door must be a multiple of 64 pixels wide and high.

Author:
Christopher Keefer
